eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Riverside, CA; and San Bernardino, CA; AT 07:14 PM ON SEP 05, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 08:14 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
